channel.title: Improving the design
channel.description:
Hi there Mopar,
I've being developing this current project for just under a year now, and it's finally coming to the final stages. Basically, what my project is, is a website which teachers can create, edit and delete exams on. Also a place where students can sit the exams which they're invited too. There is a lot more functionality then that. But what i'll do is for every photo, i'll give you a run down on what the specific page does.
What I want you to help me with is the design, I know the design is awful I just need some help rearranging and redesigning some pages. I want it to be as user friendly as possible, and not be a eye sore. I am only going to show the pages I believe need redesigning, when this is turned into a live version for my school, I will allow you access to a version if you'd like. It's only two pages at the moment.
Navigation Page - Pretty self explanatory, this is a big one that needs work because as you can see it's an awful looking navigation page and it's quite confusing to navigate through and it's ugly.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UyKamN2.png[/img]
Invite Page - This page is where teachers invite students to sit test's that they have previously created. They can also invite a classroom of students which they populate on another page.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1kbBf12.png[/img]
